how 'bout just an attack that lets you launch all the fire elementals 
fireballs in one direction? either in a stream or a group.


----Original Message Follows----

I would like to see one ability of Giant Skeletons is to "split" into
normal sized skeletons.  The other thing I would like to bring up is a
Giant Skeleton being able to form a tornado and use the tornado to hit
opponents.

Fire Elementals - I still like the idea of a suicide attack for fire
elementals, but only available for fire elementals that are not
summoned and are at least experience level 12.  I would also love a
giant fireball attack.
